name: Touhou.RB
description:
Touhou.RB is a shooter made for the "Epitech Game Jam #2022".

It's a shooter inspired by the classics (such as Touhou Project and R-Type) where you play somebody of the Gensokyo World (Land of Fantasy) fighting each other, and throwing an infinite amount of (bullets a.k.a ammo).

The Touhou games are generally very hard, it's known as the Touhou experience.

Will you beat the final Boss ? It's up to you.

Controls:

    In the main menu you can touch RIGHT_SHIFT to enable 2 players mode

    In the game: 

         Player1: 

               - Shoot: SPACE

               - LEFT, RIGHT, UP, DOWN: W, A, S, D (If you are on a French Keyboard it will work too)

         Player2: 

               - Shoot:RIGHT_SHIFT

               - LEFT, RIGHT, UP, DOWN:ARROW_KEYS
